alert.note: Alert for Carroll; Cobb; Douglas; North Fulton; South Fulton (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 25 at 5:13PM EST by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Fayette, east central Carroll, south central Cobb, Douglas, north central Coweta and southwestern Fulton Counties through 545 PM EST ... At 512 PM EST, a line of strong thunderstorms was along a line extending from near Bill Arp to Dunaway Gardens to near Powers Crossroads, and moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...40 to 50 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Atlanta, Newnan, Douglasville, City of South Fulton, Smyrna, Peachtree City, East Point, Union City, Fairburn, Tyrone, Palmetto, Chattahoochee Hills, Bill Arp, Fairplay, Dunaway Gardens, Cannongate, Campbellton, Sandtown, Madras, and Sweetwater Creek State Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.

area.areaDesc: Carroll; Cobb; Douglas; North Fulton; South Fulton
